org.jmotif.sax

Class SAXFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmotif.sax.SAXFactory

  • public final class SAXFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements SAX algorithms.

    Pavel Senin

    • Method Detail

      • ts2saxZnormByCutsNoSkip

        public static SAXFrequencyData ts2saxZnormByCutsNoSkip(Timeseries ts,
                                                       int windowSize,
                                                       int paaSize,
                                                       double[] cuts)
                                                throws TSException,
                                                       java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Convert the timeseries into SAX string representation, normalizes each of the pieces before SAX conversion. NOSKIP means that ALL SAX words reported.
        Parameters:
        ts - The timeseries given.
        windowSize - The sliding window size used.
        paaSize - The number of the points used in the PAA reduction of the time series.
        cuts - The alphabet cuts to use.
        Returns:
        The SAX representation of the timeseries.
        Throws:
        TSException - If error occurs.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      • ts2saxZnormByCuts

        public static SAXFrequencyData ts2saxZnormByCuts(Timeseries ts,
                                                 int windowSize,
                                                 int paaSize,
                                                 double[] cuts)
                                          throws TSException,
                                                 java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Convert the timeseries into SAX string representation, normalizes each of the pieces before SAX conversion. Not all SAX words reported, if the new SAX word is the same as current it will not be reported.
        Parameters:
        ts - The timeseries given.
        windowSize - The sliding window size used.
        paaSize - The number of the points used in the PAA reduction of the time series.
        cuts - The alphabet cuts to use.
        Returns:
        The SAX representation of the timeseries.
        Throws:
        TSException - If error occurs.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      • ts2saxNoZnormByCuts

        public static SAXFrequencyData ts2saxNoZnormByCuts(Timeseries ts,
                                                   int windowSize,
                                                   int paaSize,
                                                   double[] cuts)
                                            throws TSException
        Convert the timeseries into SAX string representation. It doesn't normalize anything.
        Parameters:
        ts - The timeseries given.
        windowSize - The sliding window size used.
        paaSize - The number of the points used in the PAA reduction of the time series.
        cuts - The alphabet cuts to use.
        Returns:
        The SAX representation of the timeseries.
        Throws:
        TSException - If error occurs.

        alphabetSize - The SAX alphabet size.
        Returns:

      • strDistance

        public static int strDistance(char[] a,
                              char[] b)
                       throws TSException
        Compute the distance between the two strings, this function use the numbers associated with ASCII codes, i.e. distance between a and b would be 1.
        Parameters:
        a - The first string.
        b - The second string.
        Returns:
        The pairwise distance.
        Throws:
        TSException - if length are differ.

      • strDistance

        public static int strDistance(char a,
                              char b)
        Compute the distance between the two chars based on the ASCII symbol codes.
        Parameters:
        a - The first char.
        b - The second char.
        Returns:
        The distance.

      • saxMinDist

        public static double saxMinDist(char[] a,
                                char[] b,
                                double[][] distanceMatrix)
                         throws TSException
        This function implements SAX MINDIST function which uses alphabet based distance matrix.
        Parameters:
        a - The SAX string.
        b - The SAX string.
        distanceMatrix - The distance matrix to use.
        Returns:
        distance between strings.
        Throws:
        TSException - If error occurs.

      • instances2Discords

        public static DiscordRecords instances2Discords(weka.core.Instances tsData,
                                                java.lang.String dataAttributeName,
                                                int windowSize,
                                                int alphabetSize,
                                                int discordsNumToReport)
                                         throws TrieException,
                                                TSException
        Build the SAX trie out of Instances reporting discords.
        Parameters:
        tsData - The timeseries.
        windowSize - PAA window size to use.
        alphabetSize - The SAX alphabet size.
        dataAttributeName - The WEKA attribute - essentially points on the instance attribute which bears the data value in this case.
        discordsNumToReport - how many discords to report.
        Returns:
        Discords found within the series.
        Throws:
        TrieException - if error occurs.
        TSException - if error occurs.

      • series2Discords

        public static DiscordRecords series2Discords(double[] series,
                                             int windowSize,
                                             int alphabetSize,
                                             int discordsNumToReport,
                                             SlidingWindowMarkerAlgorithm markerAlgorithm)
                                      throws TrieException,
                                             TSException
        Build the SAX trie out of the series and reports discords.
        Parameters:
        series - The timeseries.
        windowSize - PAA window size to use.
        alphabetSize - The SAX alphabet size.
        discordsNumToReport - how many discords to report.
        Returns:
        Discords found within the series.
        Throws:
        TrieException - if error occurs.
        TSException - if error occurs.

      • series2DiscordsAndMotifs

        public static DiscordsAndMotifs series2DiscordsAndMotifs(double[] series,
                                                         int windowSize,
                                                         int alphabetSize,
                                                         int discordCollectionSize,
                                                         int motifsCollectionSize,
                                                         SlidingWindowMarkerAlgorithm markerAlgorithm)
                                                  throws TrieException,
                                                         TSException
        Builds two collections - collection of "discords" - the surprise or unique patterns and the collection of the motifs - most frequent patterns. This method leveraging the Trie structure - so the sliding window size will be translated into the alphabet size by using PAA.
        Parameters:
        series - The data series.
        windowSize - The sliding window size.
        alphabetSize - The alphabet size.
        discordCollectionSize - The size of the discord collection - how many top discords we want to keep.
        motifsCollectionSize - The size of the motif collection - how many top motifs we want to keep.
        Returns:
        All what was promised if finishes.
        Throws:
        TrieException - if error occurs.
        TSException - if error occurs.

      • getSaxVals

        public static char[] getSaxVals(double[] vals,
                                int windowSize,
                                double[] cuts)
                         throws TSException
        Convert real-valued series into symbolic representation.
        Parameters:
        vals - Real valued timeseries.
        windowSize - The PAA window size.
        cuts - The cut values array used for SAX transform.
        Returns:
        The symbolic representation of the given real time-series.
        Throws:
        TSException - If error occurs.

                                    int start,
                                    int end)
        Extracts sub-series from series.
        Parameters:
        data - The series.
        start - The start position.
        end - The end position
        Returns:
        sub-series from start to end.

                                int[] controls,

                         throws TSException
        Brute force calculation of the distances.
        Parameters:
        tsData - timeseries.
        dataAttributeName - The pointer onto data-bearing attribute.
        controls - The control values.
        window - Window size.
        Throws:
        TSException - if error occurs.

      • getBruteForceDiscords

        public static DiscordRecords getBruteForceDiscords(double[] tsData,
                                                   int windowLength)
                                            throws TSException
        "We are given n, the length of the discords in advance, and we must choose two parameters, the cardinality of the SAX alphabet size a, and the SAX word size w. We defer a discussion of how to set these parameters until"
        Parameters:
        tsData - timeseries.
        windowLength - window length.
        Returns:
        top discords for the time-series given
        Throws:
        TSException - if error occurs.
